content: 5/28/25 8 59 am page 1 of 4 round leggy frog pattern by little frog crochet 5/28/25 8 59 am page 2 of 4 intro i hope you enjoy my no sew round leggy frog pattern this is a pretty quick pattern should take less than 30 min do not steal this pattern or claim it as you own you can sell makes from this pattern i would appreciate it if you credited me as the designer have fun and please leave a journal i can t wait to see what you make note us abbr pattern sizes level intermediate abbreviations fo = fasten o magic_ring = magic_ring bbl = bobble chain = chain decrease = decrease increase = increase single_crochet = single_crochet skip = skip slip_stitch = slip_stitch st = stitch 5/28/25 8 59 am page 3 of 4 materials yarns worsted worsted hooks - 2 5−3mm hook interfacing - 8mm safety eyes round leggy frog all bobbles in this pattern are made with 4 double crochets 5 loops on hook 1 sc6 in magic_ring 6 2 inc6 12 3 sc1 increase x6 18 sc1 increase sc2 increase bbl sc1 increase sc2 increase sc1 bbl 4 increase sc2 increase sc1 24 5 sc5 increase x4 28 5/28/25 8 59 am page 4 of 4 sc8 *ch16 sk1 sl st3 ch4 sk1 sl st3 ch4 sk1 sl st3 ch4 sk1 sl st3 sl st12 back down the 6 chain* between the *s is one arm the pattern is the same for all arm/legs sc13 arm/leg sc7 28 add eyes on the bobbles on the side without the st marker and add mouth see picture 7−12 sc28 28 sc5 decrease sc3 arm/leg sc2 decrease sc5 decrease 13 sc2 arm/leg sc3 decrease 24 14 sc2 decrease x6 18 15 sc1 decrease x6 12 stu 16 dec6 6 fo and sew shut
